manual.description0: LikeCoin token migration is now live! The new LikeCoin supports the latest launch of LikeCoin chain. If you are an owner of LikeCoin ERC-20, please prepare your ETH wallet (Metamask or Ledger) and follow the instructions below.
manual.description1: During this process, your LikeCoin ERC-20 will be migrated to the new LikeCoin. Note that  your LikeCoin ERC-20 will be permanently decommissioned.
manual.description2: All registered LikeCoin users will be given a free Cosmos wallet bind with your Liker ID. The system will automatically prefill the new Cosmos wallet address for you in the following steps.

likerId.description0: LikeCoin token migration is now live! The new LikeCoin supports the latest launch of LikeCoin chain. If you are an owner of LikeCoin ERC-20, please prepare your ETH wallet (Metamask or Ledger) and Cosmos wallet in the following instructions.
likerId.description1: During this process, your LikeCoin ERC-20 will be migrated to the new LikeCoin. Note that your LikeCoin ERC-20 will be permanently decommissioned.
likerId.description2: Please kindly be advised to check your Cosmos wallet address is accurate and correctly filled. (Cosmos wallet address should start with “cosmos1”) Any LikeCoin transfer that goes to other non-supported wallet address will most likely be lost and unable to be retrieved.

StepSign.title: Sign to confirm
StepSign.description: Please make sure the following information is accurate. Once you sign and confirm the transfer, we are unable to undo the transaction. If you are ready to proceed, please press SIGN.

message.addressNotMatch: Please use eth address {wallet} for signing

StepPendingTx.doneDescription: You may view your completed transaction on {0}
